item.title: Goosey add a quote by Christopher Moore
Goosey add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "If you think anyone is sane you just don't know enough about them." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Stephenie Meyer: Her vampires are sparkly, which I think we can all agree is wrong." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Goosey add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Goosey add a quote by David Wong
item.description: "The zombie looks like a man, walks like a man, eats and otherwise functions fully, yet is devoid of the spark. It represents the nagging doubt that lays deep in the heart of even the most zealous believer: <i>behind all of your pretty songs and stained glass, this is what you really are. Shambling meat.</i> Our true fear of the zombie was never that its bite would turn us into one of them. Our fear is that we are already zombies." -- David Wong

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Hereâ€™s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Helen Fielding
item.description: "It is a truth universally acknowledged that when one part of your life starts going okay, another falls spectacularly to pieces." -- Helen Fielding

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "My library is an archive of longings." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "What do you want from me?" he asks. What I want from every person in my life, I want to tell him. More." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Goosey add a quote by David Wong
item.description: "What humans want most of all, is to be right. Even if we're being right about our own doom. If we believe there are monsters around the next corner ready to tear us apart, we would literally prefer to be right about the monsters, than to be shown to be wrong in the eyes of others and made to look foolish." -- David Wong

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Edmund Wilson
item.description: "No two persons ever read the same book." -- Edmund Wilson

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "I think it is all a matter of love; the more you love a memory the stronger and stranger it becomes" -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description: "Hope can be a powerful force. Maybe there's no actual magic in it, but when you know what you hope for most and hold it like a light within you, you can make things happen, almost like magic." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Goosey add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Write the kind of story you would like to read. People will give you all sorts of advice about writing, but if you are not writing something you like, no one else will like it either." -- Meg Cabot
